title: Did you send text messages to "RBG" to 50409 to the senators?
subtitle: A further campaign was carried out by the Resistbot Political Defence Service after the death of United States Supreme Court Judge Ruth Bader Gensburg in September 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The text "RBG" to 50409 operates a service called "Resistbot" and generates an e-mail encouraging late voting on a new Supreme Court judge,
